short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A ChatGPT enabled resume writer, cover letter creator, job search and productivity tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Resume Hub is a ChatGPT 4 enabled Chrome Extension that supports multiple languages and will assist users at quickly creating professional resumes and cover letters to make a best impression with potential employers.

This extension will ensure that the users resume will pass the ATS screening process by scanning and utilizing important keywords used in posted jobs. The power of ChatGPT will ensure that the resulting resume and cover letter will stand out from the competition and get the user through to the interview process.

This extension will also assist the user to organize job applications and assists them at keeping track of job searches to allow the user to quickly navigate to past job applications, create notes, and schedule interviews to maximize success.

Resume Hub Version History:

0.0.0.0 - Initial version

0.0.0.1 - UI fixes

0.0.0.2 - Code improvements and UI Enhancements

0.0.0.3 - Added Google Calendar events, users can now push scheduled interviews to Google Calendar to receive updates for upcoming job interviews and receive notifications on upcoming job events from Google Calendar.  UI Fixes, Code Improvements.
